      • checkPageStatusForEBook

        public int checkPageStatusForEBook(SVISlide slide)
        Get current page status information from PageTurnEffect animation equation. This function will be used for drag animation functionality of PTE library especially. This function is useless for other use cases.
        Parameters:
        tartget - SVISlide instance which want to know page status.
        Returns:
        page status of PageTurnEffect animation equation.
